scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Blacksmith Ledger is from Rural Retreat, VA c. 1928 and features approx. 200 pages of local customer order logs. Most popular product was horseshoes, but others included nails, shovels, plows, wagon wheels, etc. Inside cover is stamped with initials "J.C.L." which may refer to J. Charles Lyons.
